content.question: The Supreme Court ruling in Korematsu v. United States upheld the constitutionality of

choices.label: flag burning as a form of free speech
the internment of Japanese Americans as a wartime necessity
prohibiting Japanese workers from immigrating to the United States
excluding Japanese American children from California public schools

content.answer: the internment of Japanese Americans as a wartime necessity
